description: The Department of National Defence has a requirement for the items detailed below.
full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement
## Request for Proposal: Towbar for Aircraft C130-2F

The Canadian government has issued a Request for Proposal (RFP) for the procurement of a [Towbar for Aircraft C130-2F](#Towbar-for-Aircraft-C130-2F).

### Tender Details

* **Reference Number:** cb-834-59516048
* **Solicitation Number:** W8485-258438/A
* **Publication Date:** 2024-11-08
* **Tender Closing Date:** 2024-12-13T14:00:00
* **Expected Contract Start Date:** 2024-12-13
* **Expected Contract End Date:** 2025-03-31

### Tender Status

* **Tender Status:** Open
* **Trade Agreements:** Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

### Product Requirements

The Department of National Defence requires the following product:

* **Item 1:** Towbar, Aircraft C130-2F
	+ **Quantity:** 2 units
	+ **Unit of Issue:** Each (EA)
	+ **Delivery Location:** 25 CFSD Montreal
	+ **Delivery Date:** 28 February 2025
* **Part Number:** MANSON C130-2F FLYAWAY
* **NCAGE:** 1DD63

### Alternative Products

Bidders are encouraged to submit Equivalent or Substitute Product proposals, including the brand name and model, and/or Part Number and NCAGE.

### Additional Information

* **COVID-19 Exception:** Due to the pandemic, bidders are strongly encouraged to transmit their bids electronically using the epost Connect service.
* **Language:** Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada.
* **Crown Rights:** The Crown retains the right to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement.

### Contact Information

* **Contact Name:** Dany Lebel
* **Contact Email:** dany.lebel2@forces.gc.ca
* **Contact Phone:** (000) 000-0000

### Attachment

The tender notice and bid solicitation document can be found at [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/51393/w8485-258438a---tow-bar-rfp.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/51393/w8485-258438a---tow-bar
